description.english: Finish the game on Novice difficulty.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en difficulté Novice.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco in difficoltà Principiante.
description.spanish: Terminar el juego en la dificultad Novato.
description.german: Spiel das Spiel auf dem Anfänger-Schwierigkeitsgrad durch.

description.english: Finish the game on Revised difficulty.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en difficulté Révisité.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco in difficoltà Modificata.
description.spanish: Terminar el juego en la dificultad Revisada.
description.german: Spiel das Spiel auf dem Fortgeschritten-Schwierigkeitsgrad durch.

description.english: Finish the game on Unlimited difficulty.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en difficulté Illimité.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco in difficoltà Illimitata.
description.spanish: Terminar el juego en la dificultad Ilimitada.
description.german: Spiel das Spiel auf dem Unbegrenzt-Schwierigkeitsgrad durch.

description.english: Finish the game on Demonic difficulty.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en difficulté Démoniaque.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco in difficoltà Demoniaca.
description.spanish: Terminar el juego en la dificultad Demoníaca.
description.german: Spiel das Spiel auf dem Dämonisch-Schwierigkeitsgard durch.

description.english: Unlock Mission Mode.
description.french: Débloquer le mode Mission.
description.italian: Sblocca Modalità Missione.
description.spanish: Desbloquear el Modo Misión.
description.german: Schalte den Missions-Modus frei.

description.english: Complete Demonic Challenge Mode.
description.german: Schließe alle Dämonen-Herausforderungen ab.
description.french: Compléter le mode Défi Démoniaque.
description.italian: Completa Sfida Demoniaca.
description.spanish: Completar el Modo Desafío Demoníaco.

description.english: Complete Matrix Orders Mode.
description.german: Schließe alle Matrix-Befehle ab.
description.french: Compléter le mode Ordres Matriciels.
description.italian: Completa Modalità Ordini Della Matrice.
description.spanish: Completar el Modo Órdenes de la Matriz.

description.english: Reach Zone X in Ain Soph Aur Mode.
description.french: Atteindre la Zone X dans le mode Ain Soph Aur.
description.italian: Raggiungi Zona X in Modalità Ain Soph Aur.
description.spanish: Alcanzar la Zona X en el Modo Ain Soph Aur.
description.german: Erreiche Zone X im Ain-Soph-Aur-Modus.

description.english: Clear the game as Eryth.
description.french: Terminer le jeu avec Eryth.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco in difficoltà Eryth.
description.spanish: Terminar el juego con Eryth.
description.german: Spiel das Spiel als Eryth durch.

description.english: Clear the game as all 64 Earl types.
description.german: Spiel das Spiel mit allen 64 Earl-Typen durch.
description.french: Terminer le jeu avec les 64 types d'Earl.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco come tutti I 64 tipi di Earl.
description.spanish: Terminar el juego con los 64 Earl Types.

description.english: Defeat Endymion while Demonic Shift is active.
description.french: Vaincre Endymion lors d'une Modification Démoniaque.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Endymion mentre la Spinta Demoniaca è attiva.
description.spanish: Derrotar a Endymion mientras la Transformación Demoníaca está activa.
description.german: Besiege Endymion während einer Dämonenverschiebung.

description.english: Destroy 7 cross pieces of Aenea.
description.german: Zerstöre mindestens 7 Kreuzstücke von Aenea.
description.french: Détruire les 7 parties et pièces auxiliaires de Enée.
description.italian: Distruggi I 7 traversi di Aenea.
description.spanish: Destroy 7 cross pieces of Aenea.

description.english: Destroy all parts of Volcannon.
description.french: Détruire toutes les parties du Volcannon.
description.italian: Distruggi tutte le parti di Volcannon.
description.spanish: Destruye todas las partes de Volcannon.
description.german: Zerstöre alle Teile der Volcannon.

description.english: Defeat 16 Cyclones in one game.
description.german: Besiege 16 Cyclonen in einem Spiel.
description.french: Détruire 16 Cyclones en une partie.
description.italian: Distruggi 16 Cyclones in una partita.
description.spanish: Derrota a 16 Cyclones en una partida.

description.english: Defeat 64 Leaf People in one game.
description.german: Besiege 64 Leaf-Gegner in einem Spiel.
description.french: Détruire 64 Leafs en une partie.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 64 genti Leaf in una partita.
description.spanish: Derrota a 64 Gentes de Leaf en una partida.

description.english: Defeat Slayer while only destroying the main body.
description.french: Vaincre Slayer en détruisant uniquement son corps.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Slayer mentre distruggi solo il corpo principale.
description.spanish: Derrota a Slayer destruyendo sólo su cuerpo principal.
description.german: Besiege Slayer nur durch Zerstören der Hauptteils.

description.english: Allow Lumiere to destroy 6 of your bombs.
description.german: Erlaube Lumière, 6 deiner Bomben zu zerstören.
description.french: Laisser Lumière détruire 6 bombes.
description.italian: Permetti a Lumiere di distruggere 6 delle tue bombe.
description.spanish: Permite que Lumiere destruya 6 de tus bombas.

description.english: Defeat Phaser after letting it kill you twice.
description.german: Besiege Phaser, nachdem er dich zweimal töten durfte.
description.french: Vaincre Phaser après avoir été tué deux fois.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Phaser dopo averlo lasciato sconfiggerti due volte.
description.spanish: Derrota a Phaser luego de permitir que te mate 2 veces.

description.english: Obtain 4 life items.
description.german: Finde 4 Lebensgegenstände.
description.french: Obtenir 4 vies supplémentaires.
description.italian: Ottieni 4 vite.
description.spanish: Obtén 4 ítems de vida.

description.english: Defeat Ereshkigal and Irkalla without using bombs.
description.french: Vaincre Ereshkigal et Irkalla sans utiliser de bombe.
description.italian: Sconfiggie Ereshkigal e Irkalla senza usare bombe.
description.spanish: Vence a Ereshkigal e Irkalla sin usar bombas.
description.german: Besiege Ereshkigal und Irkalla ohne Bomben zu benutzen.

description.english: Defeat Elixirel without being hit.
description.french: Vaincre Elixirel sans se faire toucher.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Elixirel senza essere colpito.
description.spanish: Vence a Elixirel sin que te dañe.
description.german: Besiege Elixirel ohne getroffen zu werden.

description.english: Defeat Elixirel Kaether through Time Up.
description.german: Besiege Elixirel Kether durch Ablaufen der Zeit.
description.french: Vaincre Elixirel Kether en laissant le temps s'écouler.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Elixirel Kaether facendo finire il tempo.
description.spanish: Vence a Elixirel Kaether haciendo que se agote el tiempo.

description.english: Defeat Elixirel Daath. Matrix Orders mode does not count.
description.french: Vaincre Elixirel Daath. Le mode "Ordres Matriciels" ne compte pas.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Elixirel Daath. Modalità ordini delle matrici non conta.
description.spanish: Vence a Elixirel Daath. El modo Órdenes de la Matriz no cuenta.
description.german: Besiege Elixirel Daath. Der Matrix-Befehle-Modus zählt nicht.

description.english: Obtain 1,000 gems in one Area.
description.german: Erlange 1.000 Edelsteine in einem Bereich.
description.french: Obtenir 1000 gemmes dans un secteur.
description.italian: Ottieni 1.000 gemme in un area.
description.spanish: Obtén 1000 gemas en una Zona.

description.english: Perform a 1,000-Hit Combo in one Area.
description.german: Vollführe eine 1.000-Treffer-Combo in einem Bereich.
description.french: Performer un combo de 1000 dans un secteur.
description.italian: Esegui una combo da 1.000 hit in un area.
description.spanish: Realiza un combo de 1000-hits en una zona.

description.english: Obtain 15,000,000 Points in one game.
description.german: Erreiche 15.000.000 Punkte in einem Spiel.
description.french: Obtenir 15.000.000 de points en une partie.
description.italian: Ottieni 15.000.000 punti in una partita.
description.spanish: Obtén 15.000.000 de puntos en una partida.

description.english: Perform 100 Onslaughts in one game.
description.german: Führe 100 Sturmangriffe in einem Spiel aus.
description.french: Effectuer 100 carnages en une partie.
description.italian: Esegui 100 massacri in una partita.
description.spanish: Ejecuta 100 Arremetidas en una partida.

description.english: Perform 4 Friction Breaks in one game.
description.german: Führe 4 Friktionsunterbrechungen in einem Spiel aus.
description.french: Effectuer 4 ruptures de friction en une partie.
description.italian: Esegui 4 interruzioni attrito in una partita.
description.spanish: Ejecuta 4 Friction Breaks (Rupturas de Fricción) en una partida.

description.english: Perform 10 Counter Bombs in one game. Auto-Counters do not count.
description.german: Verwende 10 Verteidigungsbomben in einem SPiel. Auto-Bomben zählen nicht.
description.french: Effectuer 10 contre-bombardements en une partie. Le contre-bombardement automatique ne compte pas.
description.italian: Esegui 10 contro-bombardamenti in una partita.
description.spanish: Ejecuta 10 contra-bombas en una partida. Las auto-bombas no cuentan.

description.english: Perform 10 Demonic Shifts in one game.
description.german: Führe 10 Dämonenverschiebungen in einem Spiel aus.
description.french: Effectuer 10 Modifications Démoniaque en une partie.
description.italian: Esegui 10 cariche demoniache in una partita.
description.spanish: Realiza 10 Transformaciones Demoníacas en una partida.

description.english: Obtain an extra life at the instant you lose your last life.
description.french: Obtenir une vie supplémentaire en perdant votre dernière vie.
description.italian: Ottieni una vita extra nell'istante in cui perdi la tua ultima vita.
description.spanish: Obtén una vida extra en el instante en que pierdes tu última vida.
description.german: Erhalte ein Bonus-Leben in dem Moment, wo du dein vorheriges Leben verlierst.

description.english: Complete all 32 Play Orders.
description.german: Beende alle 32 Aufträge.
description.french: Obtenir les 32 trophées du jeu.
description.italian: Completa tutti I 32 ordini di gioco.
description.spanish: Completa las 32 Órdenes Especiales del juego.

description.english: Keep the holiday spirit alive.
description.german: Steh dem Geist der Weihnacht nicht im Weg.
description.french: Sauver l'esprit de Noël.
description.italian: Mantieni in vita lo spirito natalizio.
description.spanish: Mantén vivo el espíritu de Papá Noel.
